name: DKDSCT
title: DKD SCT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnosis terms representing all stages of diabetic chronic kidney disease.),(Data Element Scope: CONDITION: CLINICAL_DRIVER:),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes all stages of chronic kidney disease diagnosis that represent impaired kidney function and end stage renal disease, caused by diabetes mellitus.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
